de.interactive_instruments.etf.testdriver

Interface Task<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<T>, de.interactive_instruments.Cancelable, de.interactive_instruments.Initializable, de.interactive_instruments.Releasable, TaskState
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TestRun, TestTask

    public interface Task<T>
extends java.util.concurrent.Callable<T>, TaskState, de.interactive_instruments.Releasable, de.interactive_instruments.Cancelable, de.interactive_instruments.Initializable
    Task interface which is implemented by Runnable objects Task objects are managed by the TaskPoolRegistry

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.interactive_instruments.etf.testdriver.TaskState

        TaskState.STATE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EID getId()
      ETF EID
      T getResult()
      Get the result even if the task did not finish! Use waitForResult() to block the calling thread until the Task finished.
      void setFuture(java.util.concurrent.Future<T> future)
      Used by the TaskPoolRegistry to set the Future after submitting the task.
      T waitForResult()
      Wait for result

        call

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        EID getId()
        ETF EID
        Returns:
        ID

      • getResult

        T getResult()
        Get the result even if the task did not finish! Use waitForResult() to block the calling thread until the Task finished.
        Returns:
        result

      • setFuture

        void setFuture(java.util.concurrent.Future<T> future)
        throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Used by the TaskPoolRegistry to set the Future after submitting the task.
        Parameters:
        future - Future callback
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the future is already set

      • waitForResult

        T waitForResult()
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Wait for result
        Returns:
        T result
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown when a thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, and the thread is interrupted, either before or during the activity.
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Exception thrown when attempting to retrieve the result of a task that aborted by throwing an exception.
